title: America - A Citizen's Guide to Democracy Inaction - Jon Stewart
description: America (The Book): A Citizen's Guide to Democracy Inaction is a 2004 humor book written by Jon Stewart and other writers of The Daily Show that parodies and satirizes American politics and worldview. It has won several awards, and generated some controversy. The book is written as a parody of a United States high school civics textbook, complete with study guides, questions, and class exercises
